data.message: please please cone back this year has been so shit for me and even more shitter i couldn't make it to see you 😭😭 i actually cried to my fella when last night because i wasnt watching you at leeds 😂 i will never forget that feeling and the tears i cried watching you and dre at Wembley you have to come back so i can experience it again when ever i am down i blast eminem and it make me feel on top of the world again true legend ❤❤

replies.message: Least you have seen him. I've been waiting since I was 15 years old to see him, I've been through some crap let me tell you, so never been that fortunate and it sucks big time, had tickets few years back, he pulled out because he was so poorly, had tickets for reading this year, after saving so long, but I had to pull out due to me being poorly. One day my dream will come true, hopefully.
i hope one day your life is complete and you get to see this legend xx
